title: Cellphone
doSteps: Protect personal information: remove SIM card, factory reset, etc
Put small items in a clear plastic bag or open cardboard box
On garbage collection day, set out 2 feet away from garbage bin
Or if item still works, think about donating it for reuse
dontSteps: Put it out for collection in bad weather
Put in regular household garbage, recycling or green bin
reasons: Harmful toxins leach into the soil and contaminate groundwater
The accumulation of pollutants in the body cause cancer and damage to DNA
Made with nonbiodegradable materials so they will not decompose
Toxic chemicals released into the air

title: Cooking oil/grease
doSteps: Put it in your organics / green bin
reasons: Clogs sewer system of house or even neighborhood
Harmful and potentially toxic to animals
Destroys shorelines, natural habitats and wildlife food supplies
